org.dellroad.msrp.msg

Class MsrpInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.dellroad.msrp.msg.MsrpInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MsrpInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    Wraps an InputStream and parses MSRP messages from the underlying input.

      • readMsrpMessage

        public MsrpMessage readMsrpMessage()
                            throws IOException
        Read the next MsrpMessage from the underlying input stream.
        Returns:
        next message read, or null if EOF is detected
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        ProtocolException - if a protocol violation is detected
        EOFException - if the remote side has closed the connection in the middle of a message
